Laceibanetsociety offers a $5 OpenVZ VPS with a selection of linux distros.
Server specs:

-2 cpu cores

-768 mb RAM

-30 Gb HDD

-1 TB Bandwidth ( 100 Mbit port )

-1 dedicated IP

Honduras and US ip and location available. Control panel add-ons and additional IP available at an extra cost. Don't miss your shot of a reliable and cheap VPS
http://laceibanetsociety.com/en/vps-services/openvz-vps/
